service.query: SELECT '전체' AS NAME , '%' AS CODE FROM DUAL UNION ALL SELECT DISTINCT REAL_PAY_DT AS NAME , REAL_PAY_DT AS CODE FROM DPS.PP_BILLMST WHERE STR_CD = ? AND PAY_YM = ? AND PAY_CYC = ? AND PAY_CNT = ? ORDER BY CODE

SELECT BILL.STR_CD /* 점 */ , DPS.FN_GET_STORE_NAME(BILL.STR_CD) AS STR_NM /* 점명 */ , BILL.VEN_CD /* 협력사 */ , DPS.FN_GET_VENDOR_NAME(BILL.VEN_CD) AS VEN_NM /* 협력사명 */ , BILL.PUMBUN_CD /* 브랜드코드 */ , DPS.FN_GET_PUMBUN_NAME(BILL.PUMBUN_CD) AS PUMBUN_NM /* 브랜드명 */ , BILL.REAL_PAY_DT /* 실지불일자 */ --, VEN.BIZ_TYPE /* 거래형태 */ --, COM.FN_GET_COMM_NAME('D', 'P002', BIZ_TYPE) AS BIZ_TYPE_NM /* 거래형태명 */ , BTIME_BAL_AMT /* 전월이월잔액 */ , 0 AS SALE_TOT_AMT /* 총매출 (PP_VENPAYDTL) */ , 0 AS REDU_AMT /* 할인 (PP_VENPAYDTL) */ , 0 AS SALE_AMT /* 매출 (PP_VENPAYDTL) */ , 0 AS SALE_COMIS_AMT /* 매출수수료(PP_VENPAYDTL) */ , NTIME_SUP_AMT /* 공급가 */ , NTIME_VAT_AMT /* 부가세 */ , NTIME_VAT_AMT + NTIME_SUP_AMT AS SUM_AMT /* 매입금액 */ , COMIS_SALE_AMT /* 이익액 */ , NTIME_PAY_AMT /* 지불대상액 */ , NTIME_BFPAY_AMT /* 선급금액 */ , NTIME_HOLD_AMT /* 보류액 */ , NTIME_DED_AMT /* 공제액 */ , NTIME_DED_CASH_AMT /* 현금입금 */ , NTIME_RLPAY_AMT /* 실지불액 */ , NTIME_BAL_AMT /* 지불후잔액 */ FROM DPS.PP_BILLMST BILL , DPS.PC_STRVENMST VEN WHERE BILL.STR_CD = VEN.STR_CD(+) AND BILL.VEN_CD = VEN.VEN_CD(+) AND BILL.STR_CD = ? AND BILL.PAY_YM = ? AND BILL.PAY_CYC = ? AND BILL.PAY_CNT = ? AND BILL.REAL_PAY_DT LIKE ? || '%' AND VEN.BIZ_TYPE = ? AND BILL.VEN_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND BILL.PUMBUN_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND ( BILL.BTIME_BAL_AMT <> 0 OR BILL.NTIME_SUP_AMT <> 0 OR BILL.NTIME_VAT_AMT <> 0 OR BILL.COMIS_SALE_AMT <> 0 OR BILL.NTIME_PAY_AMT <> 0 OR BILL.NTIME_BFPAY_AMT <> 0 OR BILL.NTIME_HOLD_AMT <> 0 OR BILL.NTIME_DED_AMT <> 0 OR BILL.NTIME_RLPAY_AMT <> 0 OR BILL.NTIME_BAL_AMT <> 0 ) ORDER BY BILL.REAL_PAY_DT , BILL.VEN_CD , BILL.PUMBUN_CD

SELECT BILL.STR_CD /* 점 */ , DPS.FN_GET_STORE_NAME(BILL.STR_CD) AS STR_NM /* 점명 */ , BILL.VEN_CD /* 협력사 */ , DPS.FN_GET_VENDOR_NAME(BILL.VEN_CD) AS VEN_NM /* 협력사명 */ , BILL.PUMBUN_CD /* 브랜드코드 */ , DPS.FN_GET_PUMBUN_NAME(BILL.PUMBUN_CD) AS PUMBUN_NM /* 브랜드명 */ , BILL.REAL_PAY_DT /* 실지불일자 */ --, VEN.BIZ_TYPE /* 거래형태 */ --, COM.FN_GET_COMM_NAME('D', 'P002', VEN.BIZ_TYPE) AS BIZ_TYPE_NM /* 거래형태명 */ , BTIME_BAL_AMT /* 전월이월잔액 */ , PAY.SALE_TOT_AMT /* 총매출 (PP_VENPAYDTL) */ , PAY.REDU_AMT /* 할인 (PP_VENPAYDTL) */ , PAY.SALE_AMT /* 매출 (PP_VENPAYDTL) */ , PAY.SALE_COMIS_AMT /* 매출수수료(PP_VENPAYDTL) */ , NTIME_SUP_AMT AS NTIME_SUP_AMT /* 공급가 */ , NTIME_VAT_AMT AS NTIME_VAT_AMT /* 부가세 */ , NTIME_SUP_AMT + NTIME_VAT_AMT AS SUM_AMT /* 매입금액 */ , COMIS_SALE_AMT /* 이익액 */ , NTIME_PAY_AMT /* 지불대상액 */ , NTIME_BFPAY_AMT /* 선급금액 */ , NTIME_HOLD_AMT /* 보류액 */ , NTIME_DED_AMT /* 공제액 */ , NTIME_DED_CASH_AMT /* 현금입금 */ , NTIME_RLPAY_AMT /* 실지불액 */ , NTIME_BAL_AMT /* 지불후잔액 */ FROM DPS.PP_BILLMST BILL , (SELECT STR_CD , VEN_CD /* 협력사 */ , PUMBUN_CD , SUM(SALE_TOT_AMT) AS SALE_TOT_AMT /* 총매출 */ , SUM(REDU_AMT) AS REDU_AMT /* 할인 */ , SUM(SALE_AMT) AS SALE_AMT /* 매출 */ , SUM(SALE_COMIS_AMT) AS SALE_COMIS_AMT /* 매출수수료 */ , SUM(SUP_AMT) AS SUP_AMT /* 공급가 */ , SUM(VAT_AMT) AS VAT_AMT FROM DPS.PP_VENPAYDTL WHERE STR_CD = ? AND PAY_YM = ? AND PAY_CYC = ? AND PAY_CNT = ? AND PAY_DT LIKE ? || '%' AND BIZ_TYPE = ? AND VEN_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND PUMBUN_CD LIKE ? || '%' GROUP BY VEN_CD , PUMBUN_CD , STR_CD ) PAY , DPS.PC_STRVENMST VEN WHERE BILL.STR_CD = PAY.STR_CD(+) AND BILL.VEN_CD = PAY.VEN_CD(+) AND BILL.PUMBUN_CD = PAY.PUMBUN_CD(+) AND BILL.STR_CD = VEN.STR_CD AND BILL.VEN_CD = VEN.VEN_CD AND BILL.STR_CD = ? AND BILL.PAY_YM = ? AND BILL.PAY_CYC = ? AND BILL.PAY_CNT = ? AND BILL.REAL_PAY_DT LIKE ? || '%' AND VEN.BIZ_TYPE = ? AND BILL.VEN_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND BILL.PUMBUN_CD LIKE ? || '%' AND ( BILL.BTIME_BAL_AMT <> 0 OR PAY.SALE_TOT_AMT <> 0 OR PAY.REDU_AMT <> 0 OR PAY.SALE_AMT <> 0 OR PAY.SALE_COMIS_AMT <> 0 OR BILL.NTIME_SUP_AMT <> 0 OR BILL.NTIME_VAT_AMT <> 0 OR BILL.COMIS_SALE_AMT <> 0 OR BILL.NTIME_PAY_AMT <> 0 OR BILL.NTIME_BFPAY_AMT <> 0 OR BILL.NTIME_HOLD_AMT <> 0 OR BILL.NTIME_DED_AMT <> 0 OR BILL.NTIME_RLPAY_AMT <> 0 OR BILL.NTIME_BAL_AMT <> 0 ) ORDER BY BILL.REAL_PAY_DT , BILL.VEN_CD , BILL.PUMBUN_CD
